text: The 2019 Ole Miss Rebels softball team represents the University of Mississippi in the 2019 NCAA Division I softball season. The Rebels play their home games at the Ole Miss Softball Complex. ==Previous season== The Rebels finished the 2018 season 32–25 overall, and 7–17 in the conference. The Rebels entered the 2018 NCAA Division I Softball Tournament as the #2 seed in the Arizona State regional.
